downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3 white paper: Work breakdown structures
downloadDescription: This white paper describes how to create and use a work breakdown structure of tasks for projects in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.

downloadFile.name: Work Breakdown Structures in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/e/1/7/e17d9b07-574f-4772-9e21-916f48e073c7/Work Breakdown Structures in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3.pdf

detailsSection: In Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, you can use a work breakdown structure (WBS) to organize and prioritize tasks for a project. In a WBS, you create a hierarchy of tasks that represents the project team’s understanding of the composition of work, and the size, cost, and duration of each component or task. This white paper describes how to create and maintain a WBS, and how to create a WBS template that you can use for similar projects.
detailsSection_file_name: Work Breakdown Structures in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
